p: Where MIC CKEO and MIC antibiotic are MICs of CKEO and antibiotic when used alone; C CKEO and C antibiotic are MICs of CKEO and antibiotic at their isoeffective combination respectively. FICI was interpreted as follows: FICI < 0.5, synergistic, FICI of ≥0.5 and < 1 partial synergy; FICI of 1 additive; FICI > 4 antagonistic.
